presentationTable.name: Facts - Email Rates
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics

presentationColumns.name: Bounceback Rates
presentationColumns.description: The Email Bounceback rate. This metric is computed as follow: (Total Soft and Hard bouncebacks/Total Emails sent)*100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.Bounceback Rates

presentationColumns.name: Hard Bounceback Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Hard Bounceback rate. This metric is computed as follow: (Total Hard bouncebacks/Total Emails sent)*100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.Hard Bounceback Rate

presentationColumns.name: Soft Bounceback Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Soft Bounceback rate. This metric is computed as follow: (Total Soft bouncebacks/Total Emails sent)*100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.Soft Bounceback Rate

presentationColumns.name: Delivered Rate
presentationColumns.description: The email Delivered Rate. This metric is computed as follow: (Total Emails delivered/Total Emails sent)*100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.Delivered Rate

presentationColumns.name: Open Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Email Open Rate. This metric is computed as follow: (Total Emails Opened/Total Emails Delivered)*100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.Open Rate

presentationColumns.name: Possible Forward Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Possible Forward Rate. This metric is computed as follow: (Total Possible Forwarders/Total Emails Delivered)*100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.Possible Forward Rate

presentationColumns.name: Unsubscribed Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Unsubscribe Rate. This metric is computed as follow: (Total Unsubscribes/Total Emails Delivered)*100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.Unsubscribed Rate

presentationColumns.name: Clickthrough Rate (CTR)
presentationColumns.description: The Clickthrough Rate. This metric is computed as follow: (Total Clickthroughs/Total Emails Delivered)*100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Email Activities.Clickthrough Rate (CTR)
